title: Why is NA so damn laggy
body: My friends and I are lagging like hell, with tons of packet loss. But the PBE servers are just fine for one of them, so y. rito fix pls. I've been getting packet loss and bad ping a lot now

replies.body: It sounds like you may be having problems specifically staying connected to the game server, even if your net is fine elsewhere.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to confirm any packet loss or routing issues to the game server.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot any local problems that may be causing network problems.  Let me know what you find.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=scmlfEAE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-05T15:36:29.487+0000)
>
> It sounds like you may be having problems specifically staying connected to the game server, even if your net is fine elsewhere.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to confirm any packet loss or routing issues to the game server.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot any local problems that may be causing network problems.  Let me know what you find.

It says that I just have high ping, but I was having ~297 ping but some projectiles wouldn't load, people would "teleport" (or better said as blinking, like using flash but without the visual effects) around. :-( It seems better now, but yesterday was rather unplayable (except for one game I had).

Me your #friend
Everything else basically runs fine internet wise, it's only NA that lags
I've checked online steam games, paladins and blizzard games and all of them have normal ping(Even though i play from SEA and set the server to NA)
